DOC.brief_title: Phase I Study Safety , Tolerance , Pharmacokinetics 9-2- ( Bispivaloyloxymethyl ) PhosphonylmethoxyethylAdenine ( Bis-POM PMEA ; Adefovir Dipivoxil ) HIV-Infected Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Five patient enter three dose level bis-POM PMEA administer orally single dose .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Concurrent Medication : Allowed : AZT , ddI , ddC ( provided patient stable regimen least 4 week prior study entry ) . Prophylactic aerosolized pentamidine , fluconazole , ketoconazole , trimethoprim/sulfamethoxazole , dapsone ( provided patient stable regimen least 4 week prior study entry ) . Patients must : Documented HIV infection diagnosis AIDS . Life expectancy least 3 month . Prior Medication : Allowed : Prior AZT , ddI , ddC . Prophylactic aerosolized pentamidine , fluconazole , ketoconazole , trimethoprim/sulfamethoxazole , dapsone . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow symptoms condition exclude : Active , serious infection ( HIV infection ) require parenteral antibiotic therapy . Clinically significant cardiac disease , include symptom ischemia , congestive heart failure , arrhythmia . Gastrointestinal malabsorption syndrome inability receive oral medication . Concurrent Medication : Excluded : Diuretics . Amphotericin B. Aminoglycoside antibiotic . Parenteral antibiotic . Other nephrotoxic agent . Other investigational agent . Nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug . Aspirin . Prior Medication : Excluded within 2 week prior study entry : Diuretics . Amphotericin B. Aminoglycoside antibiotic . Parenteral antibiotic . Other nephrotoxic agent . Other investigational agent . Excluded within 3 day prior study entry : Nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug . Aspirin . Active substance abuse ( include alcohol drug abuse ) .
